While a Werebear, each enemy you kill will increase your Attack and Movement Speeds by 8% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
While a Werewolf, generate 3 Primal Power for each enemy killed. Can only trigger once every second.
While a Werewolf, you deal 10% increased damage against enemies suffering from a continual damage effect.
While a Werewolf, you deal 20% increased damage to enemies, reduced by 5% for every ally within 5 yards of enemies.
While a Werewolf, you gain additional Life Drain against enemies below 50% Life.

While Abomination is active, defeating an enemy heals you for 5% of your Life, up to a maximum of 80% Life restored during your transformation.
While Abomination is active, defeating an enemy increases the remaining duration of Abomination by .4 seconds, up to a maximum increase of 4.8 seconds.
While Abomination is active, the longer you remain near an enemy the more damage you deal to them, up to a maximum damage increase of 20%.
